org.sakaiproject.memory.impl

Class MemoryServiceTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.memory.impl.BasicMemoryService
      • org.sakaiproject.memory.impl.MemoryServiceTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, MemoryService

    public class MemoryServiceTest
extends BasicMemoryService

    MemoryServiceTest extends the basic memory service providing the dependency injectors for testing.

      • newCache

        public Cache newCache(String cacheName,
             CacheRefresher refresher,
             String pattern)
        Description copied from interface: MemoryService
        Construct a Cache. Attempts to keep complete on Event notification by calling the refresher.
        Specified by:
        newCache in interface MemoryService
        Overrides:
        newCache in class BasicMemoryService
        Parameters:
        cacheName - Load a defined bean from ComponentManager or create a default cache with this name.
        refresher - The object that will handle refreshing of event notified modified or added entries.
        pattern - The "startsWith()" string for all resources that may be in this cache - if null, don't watch events for updates.

      • newCache

             String pattern)
        Description copied from interface: MemoryService

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        cacheName - Load a defined bean from ComponentManager or create a default cache with this name.
        pattern - The "startsWith()" string for all resources that may be in this cache - if null, don't watch events for updates.

      • newCache

        public Cache newCache(String cacheName,
             CacheRefresher refresher)
        Description copied from interface: MemoryService
        Construct a Cache. Automatic refresh handling if refresher is not null.
        Specified by:
        newCache in interface MemoryService
        Overrides:
        newCache in class BasicMemoryService
        Parameters:
        cacheName - Load a defined bean from ComponentManager or create a default cache with this name.
        refresher - The object that will handle refreshing of expired entries.
